segments.text: Look ! There's even a built-in handle to carry it with .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But it's so thin . There's no way that it comes with a CD-ROM .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yes , it does . Look , here it says that the CD-ROM is built-in !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It says that it comes in teal and tangerine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And it says that it sleeps .
segments.speaker: S1
